Synchronize with Icon Library Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Select Tools»Synchronize with ni.com Icon Library from the Icon Editor dialog box to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to synchronize the LabVIEW Data\Glyphs directory with the most recent glyphs in the Icon Library at ni.com.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Install—Specifies whether to save the corresponding glyph from the Icon Library to the LabVIEW Data\Glyphs directory. If an icon exists in the Icon Library but not in the LabVIEW Data\Glyphs directory, LabVIEW automatically places a checkmark in the corresponding Install checkbox.
  • Current—Displays a screenshot of each glyph in the LabVIEW Data\Glyphs directory. If the Current screenshot differs from the corresponding Icon Library screenshot, either the glyph has changed on disk or the glyph in the Icon Library on ni.com has changed. Place a checkmark in the corresponding Install checkbox to save the glyph from the Icon Library to the LabVIEW Data\Glyphs directory.
  • Icon Library—Displays a screenshot of each glyph in the Icon Library. If the Current screenshot differs from the corresponding Icon Library screenshot, either the glyph has changed on disk or the glyph in the Icon Library on ni.com has changed. Place a checkmark in the corresponding Install checkbox to save the glyph from the Icon Library to the LabVIEW Data\Glyphs directory.
  • Subfolder—Specifies the subfolder of the LabVIEW Data\Glyphs directory in which to save the glyph if you place a checkmark in the corresponding Install checkbox.
  • Name—Specifies the filename of the glyph without the file extension. LabVIEW saves glyphs as 256-color .png files.
  • Select/Deselect All—Places or removes a checkmark from the Install checkbox for all glyphs.
